review: These Capos are wonderful. Perfect all the way around! long lasting and backed up by the company. I have three!
If your not sure what to buy you are prob looking for the light strings. These are a littl ehard to play.
I would def recommend this to anyone but for electric only. If you are going to be playing acoustic I would get their specific acoustic cable. This is a very heavy guage. Sounds great!
Not much to say here but is really nice to have around. Hold my picks tight and has them where i need them
This is definately worth the money. I was looking for a metronome and got this awesome unit that does it all. Bought another one for my friend!
This is the only brand I would ever buy the sound is superior and easy to play. These are well worth the money!

So heres the thing that no one else wants to say. The thing is built like a piece of s***. It jingles and rattles and parts are always moving around. I used this 3 times and it shorted out. The lights started flashing and it got hot. I called line 6 and they determined it was bad so they opened a "ticket". FYI if you want to deal with the worst customer service in the industry just call line 6. Not only do they not know what they were talking about but in the backgrounc I could hear them lauging and joking like there was a big party going on. I wish I would have never bought this but hopefully I get  a new one soon. Well see how helpful they really are.
This is my second and I love them so much. They work flawlessley and tune is amazing! Get one and dont hesitate
Cheap, Easy, Durable, these things are worth the small price. I have one for each guitar and just leave them on!
